Despite being blind, Toph uses her feet to see, or rather feel her way around things, any subtle vibrations through the ground can tell more about her surroundings than eyesight ever could, and I was hoping to share some vibrations of my own. I had just arrived at her home and I noticed there was a celebration going on, it was her 21st birthday. As I approached the main gate, two guards stopped me.

"I'm sorry stranger, but you must have an invitation to attend the Lady Toph's birthday party." The first guard said. I couldn't help but smile.
